answers.author: Jayme Bosio
answers.text:
Palm Beach County, FL, Government policy states" "Facilities in Palm Beach County shall be named according to location and/or function only (i.e., South County Courthouse, Riverbend Park). Source: PPM #CW-0-044(A) The county's intent in establishing the policy was to take politics out of the facility naming process. Memorials and monuments are not inclusive in the policy.
